Description: Rim and wall sherd (mended from three fragments) of early Chian patterned pottery chalice, with part of cul; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; above and below, added red band lined in white; exterior: reserved save for narrow black line on edge of rim and brown line at top of cul; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 11)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 643, no. 13, pl. 20)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0322) (phase 2)
